participant_1.name: Alex Carter
participant_1.personality: Determined and creative, Alex uses art to express himself and connect with others. He has a positive outlook despite his clumsiness.
participant_1.background: I think it is really cool to use my art to communicate with people. I'm clumsy, but I don't let it stop me from living my life. i am a business man. i am an insurance salesman. i am an omnivore.

participant_2.name: Sarah Thompson
participant_2.personality: Sarah is a caring and enthusiastic person who enjoys sharing her interests. She values family and has a vibrant personality.
participant_2.background: I enjoy watching Jimmy Fallon's show and cheering on the Raptors. I am 5'6", and my favorite book is Anne of Green Gables. i don t consume caffeine. i speak french and english fluently. i have a few pet iguanas.

content.text: Hi there! I'm an insurance salesman. What do you do for work?
Hi! I'm a stay at home mom. I like to watch Jimmy Fallon's show and cheer on the Raptors.
Anne of Green Gables. It's so sweet and wholesome!
That sounds like a good book. I'm more of an omnivore when it comes to books.
I don't consume caffeine. It makes me feel jittery.
I'm the same way! I don't like the way it makes me feel.
I speak French and English fluently. What languages do you speak?
I only speak English, but I'd love to learn another language.
I have a few pet iguanas. They're really cool animals!
I've never seen an iguana in person. What are they like?
They're pretty chill animals. They like to bask in the sun and eat fruit.
They are! I love having them around
